subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Crystals?
author: Tracy
full_text:
--0-1635735831-1191126779=:56368
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

What kind of crystal was it Frank?  I had an experience many years ago where I was dealing with some very strange entities, I got talking to this guy who had experience with these entities and he said either they (meaning him and someone else I think) were using piezoelectric crystals to contact these entities.  Either that or meant the entities were using them.  

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:           I had a crystal in my pocket, and Chris and I both heard tem ask for the crystal, so I placed it on top of the echo box, and it seemed to clarify the voices.
 
 Frank-S
